message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that represents the cost of inventories sold would be "Cost of Goods Sold". This is the standard accounting term for the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period.

From the provided income statement, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 5700000.00 (dated 2024-02-01)

This is the value I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5700000.00'} }
```
